changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `tasksolution` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `file` LONGBLOB NULL, `checked` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `contest` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `compiler` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `user` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `task` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `fk_tasksolution_contest_idx` (`contest`), INDEX `fk_tasksolution_compiler1_idx` (`compiler`), INDEX `fk_tasksolution_users1_idx` (`user`), INDEX `fk_tasksolution_task1_idx` (`task`), ) COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE = MyISAM ;
